#summary Tutorial: How to manage Friend list

== Manage Buddy List ==

=== Right Click menu ===

1.From the Friend list,right click on one of your friend. Then you will see a small menu beside your friend name.<br>

http://parrot-im.googlecode.com/files/rightClickMenu.jpg


2. You have 5 options to choose.<br><br>
  * start new conversation : start a chat window with this friend.
  * add to open conversation :  add this friend to a conversation window which is already opened.
  * remove friend : remove this friend from list.
  * block friend  : block this friend.
  * view profile  : view this friend's profile.
